name: Tehos
description:
In Tehos, the goal is to protect a fortress with an army of soldiers against a very large horde of enemies.

Add your soldiers on the battlefield, equip them with incredible weapons and try to protect the fortress as long as you can !

Controls :
- Click Left to spawn soldier or interract with the shop
- Click Right to interract with entities
- Hold Space to pause
- Escape to get back to the menu
